S.FORM: Curly Armstrong tatama, nalecuh i Fort Wayne, Indiana, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, nalecuhan i 1 a bulad 11 a demiad, 1918 a mihcaan, Curly Armstrong, miunduay. (mapatay i 1983 a mihcaan) namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
